```pddl
[
  (:action equip_weapon
    :parameters (?p - player ?w - weapon)
    :precondition (and (inventory ?p ?w) (not (equipped ?w)))
    :effect (and (equipped ?w) (not (inventory ?p ?w)))),
  
  (:action load_ammunition
    :parameters (?p - player ?a - ammunition ?w - weapon)
    :precondition (and (inventory ?p ?a) (equipped ?w) (not (loaded ?w)))
    :effect (and (loaded ?w) (not (inventory ?p ?a)))),
  
  (:action equip
    :parameters (?p - player ?item - object ?container - object)
    :precondition (and 
        (inventory ?p ?item) 
        (not (equipped ?item)) 
        (or 
            (and (weapon ?item) (not (loaded ?container)) (equipped ?container))
            (and (ammunition ?item) (weapon ?container))
            (not (container ?container))
        )
    )
    :effect (and 
        (equipped ?item)
        (not (inventory ?p ?item)))),
  
  (:action load
    :parameters (?user - player ?resource - object ?target - weapon)
    :precondition (and (equipped ?target) (inventory ?user ?resource))
    :effect (and (loaded ?target ?resource) (not (inventory ?user ?resource)))),
  
  (:action use_incendiary_weapon
    :parameters (?p - player ?i - incendiary_weapon ?t - thug)
    :precondition (and (inventory ?p ?i) (health_below_50 ?t))
    :effect (and (used ?i ?t) (not (inventory ?p ?i)))),
  
  (:action attack_thug
    :parameters (?p - player ?w - weapon ?t - thug)
    :precondition (and (equipped ?w) (in_range ?p ?t))
    :effect (and (attacked ?t ?w) (health_decreased ?t))),
  
  (:action use
    :parameters (?p - player ?item - object ?target - thug)
    :precondition (and (inventory ?p ?item)
                      (or (health_below_50 ?target)
                          (in_range ?p ?target)))
    :effect (and (used ?item ?target)
                 (not (inventory ?p ?item)))),
  
  (:action attack
    :parameters (?p - player ?w - weapon ?a - ammunition ?t - thug ?iw - incendiary_weapon)
    :precondition (and 
      (equipped ?w)
      (or (loaded ?w) (used ?iw))
      (not (health_below_50 ?t))
    )
    :effect (and 
      (health_decreased ?t)
      (or (equipped ?w) (used ?iw))))
]
```
